akn:section.akn:heading: Critical Supply Chain Site Development grant program

akn:content.akn:p: (a) In general On the application of an eligible recipient, the Secretary may make grants under the “Critical Supply Chain Site Development grant program” (referred to in this section as the “grant program”) to carry out site development or expansion projects for the purpose of making the site ready for manufacturing projects.
